item.title: 希拉里-斯万克（Hilary Swank）仍然沿着洛杉矶的街道开车，她和她的母亲曾经在这条街上停车和睡觉。"尽管挑战重重，我还是怀念那些日子，我们一无所有"
item.description:
Hilary Swank still drives along the L.A. street where she and her mom used to park and sleep. "Despite the challenges, I feel nostalgia for those days, when we had nothing." https://t.co/bUQJEvi81e https://t.co/bUQJEvi81e

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 25, 2024

item.title: "整个后院都被毁了所有的景观都没了。"在经历了一天异常猛烈的风浪之后，佛罗里达州一对夫妇的房屋依然屹立不倒，这要归功于 90 根钢筋混凝土支柱。
item.description:
"The whole backyard is shot. All the landscaping is gone." After a day of unusually heavy wind and waves, a Florida couple's home is still standing, thanks to 90 concrete-and-steel pilings. https://t.co/IP26s24Vzx https://t.co/IP26s24Vzx

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 25, 2024
